title: pantalla completa YT no funciona
content: Por favor, el firefox no me deja ver pantalla completa de los videos de youtube, de repente. Ya probé con otros navegadores y si se ve pantalla completa, algo toqué por error en firefox y la pantalla completa de youtube se ponde en negro, no se ve nada, tengo que tocar escape para regresar al minireproductor, si me sugieren algo por favor.... correo gabrielteoria@gmail.com.

title: Unify the operation logic of opening links and bookmarks in the background
content: To open a link of a website in the background tab is CTRL+click, why is it that to open a bookmark of the bookmark toolbar in the background tab is CTRL+shift+click. It is confusing! A bookmark is a link! For comparison, both of them are CTRL + click in chromium. BTW, there is no explanation in advanced configuration preferences.
creator: Heporis
